duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver high-quality off-air, satellite, microwave, and digital transport programming up to the outside plant.
Install, maintain, and operate a variety of optical and electrical interfaces including coaxial cable, microwave, fiber optic transmission, CAT 6, etc.
Conduct Headend (HE), Hubs, and facility Technical Quality Assurance (TQA) inspections and ensure compliance with standards.
Troubleshoot communication architectures, topologies, hardware, software, transmission, and signaling links.
Test equipment, perform testing of emergency alert systems, and maintain required documentation in compliance with technical requirements.
Implement and document required PoP testing, maintain logs, records, and documentation in compliance with company and FCC technical requirements.
Support and maintain protocol compatibility standards, develop and implement network enhancements, and work on network planning, configuration, and optimization.
Work on projects/systems/issues surrounding network planning, configuration, and optimization.
Support all efforts to simplify and enhance the customer experience and execute network problem resolution and proof of performance tests.
Perform other duties as requested by manager.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field (or equivalent work experience)
